description: This file defines the IGuestService interface and its implementation GuestService, managing guest invitations, listing, status updates, and removals within an event planning backend.

classes.name: GuestService
classes.description: Implements guest management logic including invite, list, update status, and remove based on event ownership and guest info.

methods.name: Invite
methods.description: Creates a new guest invitation for an event if the owner owns the event.

methods.name: ListByEvent
methods.description: Retrieves list of guests for a specific event if owned by the requesting user.

methods.name: Remove
methods.description: Removes a guest from an event if the requester owns the event.

methods.name: UpdateStatus
methods.description: Updates a guest's RSVP status if the owner owns the event.
